dct_title_s: Greeley, Carlson & Company's second atlas of the city of Chicago ... with all subdivisions, railroads, docks and buildings upon a scale of 100 feet to one inch. Volume 2
dct_description_sm: 1 atlas (2 volumes) : hand colored maps; 82 cm

Atlas was compiled and drawn from actual survey ; also, from the official records of Cook County and of the CIty of Chicago, and from original plats and deeds, or authentic copies thereof.; Showing the territory bounded by Twenty-second St., Thirty-ninth St., Ashland Avenue and Lake Michigan, being sections 27, 28, 29, 32, 21 and 35 of town 39 north, range 14 east of the third principal meridian.
dct_rights_sm: Materials are in the public domain and, as such, not subject to copyright restriction. However, the Library requests users to cite the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from its map and atlas database.
